Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product comes with exceptional features and benefits that are tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10000. I believe this investment will provide you with significant value and return on your expenditure. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to take advantage of this opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
